tuv.seg: Office of the Court of Appeal – Civil
The Office of the Court of Appeal for civil matters:
Bíonn Oifig na Cúirte Achomhairc do ábhair shibhialta:
• Provides administrative support to the Court of Appeal
• Ag cur tacaíocht riarthach ar fáil don Chúirt Achomhairc
• Processes civil appeals from decisions of the High Court
• Ag próiseáil achomhairc ó chinneadh de chuid na hArd-Chúirte
Further information is available from the Office of the Court of Appeal for civil appeals
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ó Oifig na Cúirte Achomhairc maidir le hachomhairc sibhialta
